===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|心|alt1=忄|t1=heart|昔|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a feeling (of the heart).

Note that 昔 has meaning of “past, ending”, hence connotations of “feelings for the past, feeling about an ending – regret, rue”.
